mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Scott, Thomas A. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Scott, Thomas A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling WV 5 1861. By Telegraph from Washington 5 " 1861. Eight Hundred 800 smooth bores and two hundred 200 rifles for flanking companies will be packed today & sent you as early as possible. Thos A. Scott 33b 59 pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Scott, Thomas A.
Washington, D. C.
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
